sourcesContent: onb-201: provide an interface for generating keywords from a given text. there is a directory calls ‘keyword-generator’ under the src/pages. use ‘keywordgenerator’ file for developing the task. there should be input and generated keywords. a keyword is defined as a single word in a text input. the generated keywords will be n-gram keywords where n is 1, 2, and 3. n-gram keywords are defined as n consecutive keywords. e.g. “quick brown fox jump over fox” will produce following: 1-gram: quick, brown, fox, jump, over 2-gram: quick brown, brown fox, fox jump, jump over, over fox 3-gram: quick brown fox, brown fox jump, fox jump over, jump over fox be aware that there will be no duplicates. text will be application descriptions such as description of facebook on app store: this input will be taken from the user, cleaned, and keywords generated from it will be shown in an intuitive way. you can ignore styling issues like coloring or iconography and use whatever you feel comfortable with.
